title: Ticket #4601: define ordering of items within DAG input file
description:
Within a DAG input file, the definition of a node, as with 

  JOB  A  A.submit

needs to be placed within the file before other items that reference that particular job node name. This includes

  • PARENT . . . CHILD . . .
  • SCRIPT PRE
  • SCRIPT POST
  • ought to include VARS, but currently doesn't!
  • RETRY
  • PRE_SKIP
  • ABORT-DAG-ON
  • PRIORITY
  • CATEGORY

This ordering needs to be documented.
check_ins: 2015-Jan-12 14:07   Check-in [42166]: document that we must define a DAG node before referencing it #4601 (By Karen Miller )
creator: smoler
